confirm.title: Turn off Certificate verification (Weak SSL Mode)
confirm.description: Press SUBMIT to turn off certificate verification for {name}, allowing self-signed or invalid certificates to be accepted.

insecure_ssl.title: {name} SSL Certificate issue
insecure_ssl.description: A SSL certificate with a weak security key was provided

confirm.title: Turn off SSL security recommendations (INSECURE SSL Mode)
confirm.description: Press SUBMIT to turn off ssl security recommendations for {name}, allowing weak/vulrnable SSL certificates to be accepted.

from_ssl_redirect.title: {name} not accepting SSL
from_ssl_redirect.description: Device refused a secure connection and wants an insecure connection instead

confirm.title: Turn off SSL
confirm.description: Press SUBMIT to turn off use of SSL for connections to {name}.

to_ssl_redirect.title: {name} requiring SSL
to_ssl_redirect.description: Device refused an insecure connection and wants an secure connection instead

confirm.title: Turn on SSL
confirm.description: Press SUBMIT to turn on use of SSL for connections to {name}.

no_enabled_cameras.title: {name} has no available streams
no_enabled_cameras.description: All possible streams on {name} are disabled by device settings, please enable at least one stream format in the configuration: {configuration_url}

onvif_disabled.title: {name} has ONVIF disabled
onvif_disabled.description: ONVIF is used so the camera can push motion events instead of having Home Assistant constantly poll it for them. It is recommended to enable ONVIF on the camera: {configuration_url}

http_error.title: {name} communication error
http_error.description: The device returned an unknown error when attemting to communicate, it is recommended to reboot the device, or wait for a couple of hours for it to possibly clear up on its own.

confirm.title: Reboot {name}
confirm.description: The device {name} encountered a critical error and needs to be restarted for the integration to continue to communicate with it. Press SUBMIT once the device has rebooted.
